# Class NodeFactory

Factory class for creating various types of graph nodes. Provides methods to easily create and configure common node types.

##### Index

### Methods

createIntentNode createLocalLLMNode createLocalSTTNode createLocalTTSNode createRemoteKnowledgeNode createRemoteLLMNode createRemoteSTTNode createRemoteTTSNode createTextAggregatorNode createTextChunkingNode

## Methods

### `Static`createIntentNode

  * createIntentNode(props: [IntentNodeFactoryInterface](/interfaces/graph_nodes_node_factory.IntentNodeFactoryInterface)): Promise<[IntentNode](./graph_nodes_builtin_intent_node.IntentNode)>

Creates an intent matching node.

#### Parameters

    * props: [IntentNodeFactoryInterface](/interfaces/graph_nodes_node_factory.IntentNodeFactoryInterface)

Configuration parameters for the intent node

#### Returns Promise<[IntentNode](./graph_nodes_builtin_intent_node.IntentNode)>

Promise resolving to a new intent node
